same for workers in the value chain and end users. In any case, whatever the characteristics of
each situation, the undertaking must avoid double-counting the same impact by reporting it once
as an impact on its value chain workers and a second time as an impact on end users. When
appropriate, disclosing the approach used as contextual information may provide useful
information.
